body.p: “I compare my hazelnuts gathered some time ago. The beaked are pointed nuts “,” while the common are blunt; and the former are a much paler brown “,” also have a yellower and much sweeter meat.”
PE 14, pg. 193/ 9 July 1858-9 November 1858 / NNPM MA 1302:33 / T vol. # XXVII / PDF # XVII / JXI
